page.title: 19The River Goyt.
page.content: The woods of{Offerton}have a river running through them called{The Goyt. For more tham twenty years the river has been polluted.{The Stockport {Federation of Anglers}have done mush work to clean it up and have released several thousand into the waters.Many of them have died because the problem of pollution has not yet been overcome. The river should be a nice place where famnilies can go and have a picnic. There are lots of{small waterfalls and in the banks are the{nests}of many species of birds. Now we think that people will help to make the area more pleasant because there is more awareness of the problems caused by pollution and it is hoped to clear the river by{1999.
